title: compress
name: compress
description: Compress given source to different formats.

arguments.name: format
arguments.description: Format to compress (bzip,gzip,tar,tbz (tar bzip),tgz (tar gzip) and zip)

arguments.name: source
arguments.description: source file or directory to compress

arguments.name: target
arguments.description: name of the target compressed file

arguments.name: includeBaseFolder
arguments.description: take the folder or only content of folder
